eventName: Adventure That Cannot Wait for the Sun
storyName: A Job for a Museum Collection
storyInfo: Prompted by Narantuya, Lazvar decides to purchase Zubayr. Once the transaction is complete, Lazvar's pets begin to speak and reveal themselves as Sovereigns of Beasts.

attributes.content: What are we waiting for?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: A phone call. Might be a novel thing for someone as old as you.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: How much longer must we wait here?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: No more questions, just wait and see.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Can I take the call? Someone explained how it works to me a while back...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Nuh-uh-uh. No can do. They'll think we're a scam call the moment they hear your robotic voice.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Right. As you mentioned earlier, us working together is an imitation of the greatest alliance in history.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Sooo... can I ask what's in store for me, if I help you find your gem?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Oh wait, I did get something already. I got a golden slipper thrown in my face after you scared me last night.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Do you have any suggestions?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: ——No, no, I wouldn't dare ask for more. Letting me live is already more than enough. You're one of Sargon's forefathers, I should be escorting you on your quest. So please, don't be hasty.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Though, the artifact that won first place at the Harvest Gathering seemed to resemble this very gold slipper, inlaid with sapphires...
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Yes, the two of them complete the pair.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: So...
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Is making a ruckus in the dead of night also a way to make a fortune?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: They originally came in a pair, but one was lost forever in the depths of the river, so this other one naturally has its value halved.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Please entertain my curiosity. Are all modern Nightzmora... like you?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Beats me.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I've looked into the customs and beliefs of many tribes for my plunders, fences, and abductions, but I never looked into my own birthplace.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I never went back after that one sunrise.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I don't suppose... you are presently on your Khaganquest?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Khaganquest?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: (Ancient language) Khaganquest.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: ——Nuh-uh, that's the last word I ever want to hear.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I'm not doing it, not even if my ancestors compel me to.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: You mean you never performed your coming-of-age ritual?!
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Yeah? It's not that important.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I might have a few drops of Nightzmoran blood in me, but they didn't turn me into a tyrant or a conqueror, and I have no intention of letting them influence my life either.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: No, it is very important.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: How will your forebears recognize your blood, if you don't embark on your Khaganquest?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: It's fine, most of them pretty much disappeared off the ends of the earth. Unlike someone I know who suddenly sprang to life at the museum just to lecture me.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: So yeah, what about you?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I've heard that in the Shah's time, people would shave their heads bald when they came of age, that they applied perfumed ointment to their scalps. But some say the scent smelled more like a stench... so I'm pretty curious if that's true.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I also...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Oh, there we go.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Huh, I didn't expect to get news so soon.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Yes, hanim. It just so happens the gem trading post's overseer sent word that he has a gem to trade, and it fits your description in all aspects.
attributes.name: Gemstone Broker

attributes.content: Good, I'll go to him right away.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: But... it will be difficult negotiating a deal, even with my introduction.
attributes.name: Gemstone Broker

attributes.content: What? I heard from my subordinates they could simply sell their gems at the reception.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Selling is easy, but not the other way round. The trading post does not operate like a regular store. You need to offer something heavy enough to balance the scales.
attributes.name: Gemstone Broker

attributes.content: Something heavy? In value?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: ...I have an idea.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Ahem, yes. This is the deal I wanted to discuss.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: The ancient mummy from the recent museum exhibition... The Nameless General of the Shah's Very Court.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: The young overseer shoots her a complicated look, and leans down to the huge gilded box.
Zubayr lies inside silently, with his hands folded across his chest.
Narantuya thinks this is honestly Zubayr's time to shine—even his dreadful golden mask seems to be emitting a soft, sacred glow.
This box looks familiar.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: It is a sarcophagus taken from the museum in its original condition... a replica of it, I mean.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: ...(Lightly taps Zubayr's body)
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: (Examines his chest with a flashlight)
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Um, this isn't a regular artifact you can find anywhere. So if you could be more gentle and professional with it...
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: ...I hear it came back to life, and can move on its own.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: About that... I'm sure we all know the dead don't come back to life. Just Arts at play is all.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I mean, wouldn't you be afraid, if it really could move?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Afraid it might run off after, I buy it?
attributes.name: Lazvar
Narantuya
attributes.content: Well, uh...

attributes.name: Narantuya
attributes.content: Oh, is that black one your pet? Haha, what a beauty!
Of course the gem trading post's overseer, who controls the flow of money throughout the entire city, would have such a unique pet.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: (Whisper) Is that him, Woof?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: (Sniffs)
attributes.name: Woof

attributes.content: (Sits besides the sarcophagus)
attributes.name: Woof

attributes.content: Hey, look. It sniffed out the millennia-old stench you can never fake.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: It's as real as my sincerity in making this deal with you.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Of course, I know how precious this artifact is, and it'll be quite troublesome for you to handle it—I'm basically offloading my troubles to you, so I'm not exactly hoping for a windfall.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: But I guarantee the museum has no way of tracking me down...
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: No, this is an extremely heavy offer you've made.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Though it's still within the measuring limits of my scale.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Uh, okay.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: What do you want in exchange? I hear you came for a gemstone.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Well, that was the original plan, but I thought of something else on the way over. I don't need that gem anymore.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I'm an outsider, so ingots will do.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: You wish to be paid in Pure Gold? I'll go fetch the appropriate scales.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Please bring this inside to keep others from seeing it.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: So... we got a deal?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Ha, I love a man who does easy business!
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I don't like the feeling of sleeping in here one bit. You didn't have to get your subordinates to bring it here in the first place.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Ssh, don't speak... Just hold on a bit longer, I'll come retrieve you soon.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Seize the chance and find the gem you're after before the day ends.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Alright, please do come back. I still need you for something.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: This is the price I'm offering. Any objection?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Phew... ♪Remember the crescent moon on the blade, the youth's sincerity washed into gold♪
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I'll be back for sure... no objections at all! Nope!
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Well, I'll be going now.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: By all means.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: (Blinks at Zubayr)
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: (Blinks at Narantuya)
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I look forward to any future cooperation!
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I never said we'd have any future cooperation.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Hah, me neither—in the near future, at least.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: That old thing wants me to run errands for him? Sorry, but see ya!
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: ...She should have understood my signal? Narantuya, if you're truly a descendant of the Nightzmora...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: A treasury awaits you.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: He finally followed the notices I sent around and came here...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Mio, Woof.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Well done, Lazvar.
attributes.name: Woof

attributes.content: You have earned our praise.
attributes.name: Mio
